name: leaguedetails
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool esportapi.
Tool description: ESportApi offers eSports results for League of Legends, Dota 2, Counter-Strike providing also eSports standings and tournament live scores.
For increased rates and more sports, please look at: https://rapidapi.com/fluis.lacasse/api/allsportsapi2/
API description: Retrieve the details of a specific Ice Hockey league using the provided tournament ID.

tournamentid.description: The unique tournament ID for which you want to retrieve the league's details.
